name: EventDefinition
title: EventDefinition
publisher: Health Level Seven International (Clinical Decision Support)
description: The EventDefinition resource provides a reusable description of when a particular event can occur.

elements.name: EventDefinition
elements.description: The EventDefinition resource provides a reusable description of when a particular event can occur.

elements.name: url
elements.description: An absolute URI that is used to identify this event definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: A formal identifier that is used to identify this event definition when it is represented in other formats.

elements.name: version
elements.description: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the event definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance.

elements.name: name
elements.description: A natural language name identifying the event definition.

elements.name: title
elements.description: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the event definition.

elements.name: subtitle
elements.description: An explanatory or alternate title for the event definition giving additional information about its content.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The status of this event definition. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

elements.name: experimental
elements.description: A Boolean value to indicate that this event definition is authored for testing purposes and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

elements.name: subjectCodeableConcept
elements.description: A code or group definition that describes the intended subject of the event definition.

elements.name: subjectReference
elements.description: A reference to a group definition that describes the intended subject of the event definition.

elements.name: date
elements.description: The date on which the resource content was last reviewed.

elements.name: publisher
elements.description: The name of the organization or individual that published the event definition.

elements.name: contact
elements.description: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

elements.name: description
elements.description: A free text natural language description of the event definition from a consumer's perspective.

elements.name: useContext
elements.description: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed.

elements.name: jurisdiction
elements.description: A legal or geographic region in which the event definition is intended to be used.

elements.name: purpose
elements.description: Explanation of why this event definition is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

elements.name: usage
elements.description: A detailed description of how the event definition is used from a clinical perspective.

elements.name: copyright
elements.description: A copyright statement relating to the event definition and/or its contents.

elements.name: approvalDate
elements.description: The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher.

elements.name: lastReviewDate
elements.description: The date on which the resource content was last reviewed.

elements.name: effectivePeriod
elements.description: The period during which the event definition content was or is planned to be in active use.

elements.name: topic
elements.description: Descriptive topics related to the content of the event definition.

elements.name: author
elements.description: An individiual or organization primarily involved in the creation and maintenance of the content.

elements.name: editor
elements.description: An individual or organization primarily responsible for internal coherence of the content.

elements.name: reviewer
elements.description: An individual or organization primarily responsible for review of some aspect of the content.

elements.name: endorser
elements.description: An individual or organization responsible for officially endorsing the content for use in some setting.

elements.name: relatedArtifact
elements.description: Related artifacts such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references.

elements.name: trigger
elements.description: The trigger element defines when the event occurs. If more than one trigger condition is specified, the event fires whenever any one of the trigger conditions is met.
